title: Constructivist-Based English Writing Instruction Design in Science Domains

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level major-specific scientific knowledge and basic English writing proficiency
context.additional_context: Goal: Enhancing practical English writing skills for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, required for scientific paper writing and academic presentation materials

learning_goals: Learners can write three English essays reflecting the logical structure of science-related topics.
Learners can perform and incorporate peer feedback on colleagues' writing through constructivist-based peer reviews at least three times.
Learners can distinguish and utilize over 50 formal/informal English expressions appropriate for academic contexts.

resources: Sample database of English scientific papers

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
